Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: The {? | $(this.trait:gem:shape) | $(this.trait:gem:shape)} $(this.trait:gem:color) $(this.trait:gem:material) set into the center of the $(this.trait:material) $(this.trait:type) pendant.\}{? | $(this.trait:gempieces:material) | The gem is surrounded by a smattering of tiny, inset $(this.trait:gempieces:color) $(this.trait:gempieces:material) melee gems that cluster around the pendant's contours, and dissipate in number towards the center.} $(this.gem:quality_description)

The {? | $(this.trait:gem:shape) | $(this.trait:gem:shape)} $(this.trait:gem:color) $(this.trait:gem:material) set into the center of the $(this.trait:material) $(this.trait:type) pendant.\}{? | $(this.trait:gempieces:material) | The gem is surrounded by a smattering of tiny, inset $(this.trait:gempieces:color) $(this.trait:gempieces:material) melee gems that cluster around the pendant's contours, and dissipate in number towards the center.} $(this.gem:quality_description)

the tiny, inset $(this.trait:gempieces:color) $(this.traitgempieces:material) melee gems set into the {? | $(this.trait:gem:material) | and $(this.trait:gem:color) $(this.trait:gem:material)} {? | $(this.trait:type) | $(this.trait:type)} $(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material) $(this.trait:brief)

Encrusting the {? | $(this.trait:gem:material) | and $(this.trait:gem:color) $(this.trait:gem:material)} {? | $(this.trait:type) | $(this.trait:type)} $(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material) $(this.trait:brief), tiny $(this.trait:gempieces:color) $(this.trait:gempieces:material) melee gems cluster around the $(this.trait:brief)'s contoured edges, dissipating in number towards the center to add the piece an overall dazzling appearance.

the curled loop of the $(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material) {? | $(this.trait:gem:material) | and $(this.trait:gem:color) $(this.trait:gem:material)} {? | $(this.trait:type) | $(this.trait:type)} pendant
A curled $(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material) loop from which the pendant is intended to hang upon a necklace, or various other types of chain jewelry.
A curled $(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material) loop from which the pendant is intended to hang upon a necklace, or various other types of chain jewelry.

Core:Properties.Core:Property: ([ "description":(\{ "You alter your ORIGINAL_OBJECT into NEW_OBJECT", "alters ORIGINAL_OBJECT into NEW_OBJECT" \}), "input-list":(\{ (\{ \, "alteration:knowledge:shaping-pendant" \}), (\{ \, "alteration:knowledge:shaping-pendant" \}) \}), "input-list-actor":(\{ "alteration:knowledge:shaping-pendant" \}), "requiredtools":(\{ "a jewelry knife", (\{ "jewelknife" \}) \}), "skill":"metalworking", "stopvalue":(\{ "trait:type", "none", "This pendant has already been altered." \}) ])

X[S] A loose-hanging piece of jewelry typically hung via a small loop at its top, from a necklace and various other types of chain jewelries. \{? \| \$(this.trait:type) \| This \$(this.trait:material) pendant has been meticulously shaped into a detailed \$(this.trait:type). \| Classically contoured and tasteful, this pendant is bordered with a frame of close-set milgrain edging.\} \{? \| \$(this.trait:gem:material) \| The \$(this.trait:color) \$(this.trait:material) has been centrally set with a \$(this.trait:gem:color) \$(this.trait:gem:shape) \$(this.trait:gem:material), within the contours of the \$(this.trait:type) pedant's frame.\} The pendant is created in such a way to hang from a matching curled loop of \$(this.trait:material) at its top. \{? \| \$(this.trait:gempieces:material) \| Tiny, inset \$(this.trait:gempieces:color) \$(this.trait:gempieces:material) melee gems encrust the contoured edges of this pendant, gradually dissipating in number toward the center to lend the piece an overall dazzling appearance.\}
